institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 30 (Contract for training facilities and equipment, etc.)
contents: Article 30 (Contract for training facilities and equipment, etc.) ① When a joint training center enters into a contract for purchase or lease of training facilities and equipment, etc., the Joint Training Center shall comply with the Act on Contracts to which the State is a Party and the local government as a party. A contract must be concluded and executed in accordance with the Act on Contracts. ② If the joint training center intends to conclude a contract exceeding a certain amount specified in the law of paragraph 1, it must use the national comprehensive electronic procurement system pursuant to the Act on the Use and Promotion of Electronic Procurement to make announcements, bids, and conclude contracts. , ③ If the Joint Training Center executes in violation of the execution standards of Paragraph 1, the Chairman may take measures such as recovery after accounting settlement.
